definition: to issue/to distribute/to publish along with
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Some medical schools issue students with smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 一些医科学校也会给学生配发智能手机。

sentences.english: Early last year, the higher authority issued a mobile petrol car to them.
sentences.chinese: 去年年初，上级为连队配发了一台车载式移动值勤车。

definition: standardized/standard (service, method etc)/regulation (clothing etc)/formulaic/(telecommunications etc) system/format (e.g. the PAL or NTSC systems for TV signals)
to distribute/distribution/to assign (sb) to a job
to carry (on one's person)/to support (old)/Taiwan pr. [xi1 dai4]
individual soldier/(literary) isolated military unit, cut off from reinforcements
